Detailed Description

This file contains RTI DWWD test code for window size 12.5%.

DWWD window size is set to 12.5%. RTI clock source is selected as 32KHz. DWWD preload value is set for 10sec. DWWD time-out value is specified in "APP_RTI_DWWD_TIMEOUT_VALUE" macro in mili-seconds. RTI 4 suspend lines are tied to IPUC0 for this test. Test runs in two stages: stage 1: DWWD will expire in 10sec and generate Reset to System. stage 2: DWWD is serviced and should not generate Reset within 10 seconds.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum deviceLastResetStatus

Enum to report the last system reset status.

Enumerator
DEVICE_LAST_RESET_STATUS_WDT_GENERATED 

Last device reset is generated by WDT

DEVICE_LAST_RESET_STATUS_NOT_WDT_GENERATED 

Last device reset is not generated by WDT

enum rtiClockSource

Enum to select the clock source for RTI module.

Enumerator
RTI_CLOCK_SOURCE_SYSCLK1 

to select clock frequency of (sysclk1/4)

RTI_CLOCK_SOURCE_SYSCLK2 

to select clock frequency of (sysclk1/4)

RTI_CLOCK_SOURCE_32KHZ 

to select clock frequency of 32KHz

enum rtiSuspendLineCore

Enum to select the Suspend lines for RTI module.

Enumerator
RTI_SUSPEND_LINE_CORE_IPU_C0 

to select suspend line for IPU core 0

RTI_SUSPEND_LINE_CORE_IPU_C1 

to select suspend line for IPU core

RTI_SUSPEND_LINE_CORE_DSP_C0 

to select suspend line for DSP core 0

RTI_SUSPEND_LINE_CORE_DSP_C1 

to select suspend line for DSP core 1

RTI_SUSPEND_LINE_CORE_EVE 

to select suspend line for EVE
